Text: For anyone that was wondering, this dlc works, monkey business and lost expedition appear on my map. I'm not sure about the weapons dlc but from what it looks like I believe it work as well based on the installation screen (as it stated it unlocked dlc from deluxe edition), it is just me don't know where to get it. Thanks for the upload. +1

It does work, but it does only say it's gonna install the monkey business and lost expedition packs so the other dlc Hunter, Warrior, Predator does not show as far as i know, if anyone can provide a unlocker/installer for the others that would be cool
